features: Comfortable & Adjustable Brightness:Designed with 48 LED bulbs (48lumen), which gives out natural and non-flickering light that won't hurt or strain your eyes. And there are 12 light modes, you can adjust the brightness and the temp simply by touching the switch.
360° Flexible Goose Neck: designed with a soft, durable and 360 degrees rotatable goose neck, easier to adjust the lighting direction to your working area at will without harsh sound.
Round Design: The table lamp uses a special ring design, the light is more uniform than the solid,no dizzy light, no shadow and soft light,, so that your eyes no longer tired, study for long time.
Modern Design: Naturally fit your desk, room , living room and office; rotatable lamp head, made from durable plastic with 48 LEDs, cool and modern desk light.
Worry-Free Warranty:We back our lights with an 12-month warranty and promise quick respond customer support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brighten Your Mood and Wonderful Life with Decorous Eye-caring LED Desk Lamp! Whether you'd like to work in bright and focused illumination or relax with warm and gentle background light, this dimmable desk lamp never lets you down. This reading lamp emits soft light without dazzle and flicker, your eyes will never get tired. Ideal for long time of using. The simply style also makes it a good decoration for your house or office, compact and portable size that won't take up much spaces. Perfect for students and office workers.

Our product with 3 color temperature: 5000k cold(white) light, 3000k warm light, 4000k cold and warm light and 4 brightness: 10% bright, 40% bright, 70% bright, 100% bright. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is exactly what I wanted. Light works great and is easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something to mainly paint Warhammer 40K miniatures with. This works reasonably well, and I'm very pleased. It gets a bit hot after a while, but never dangerously so. The 3 different color settings are extremely useful, and I find myself using the 25/50% amber light setting more often at night while I'm working on my computer than I do for painting. I'll probably buy another one to use as a double for painting. It gets bright, even during the day, but I'd like another one to reduce shadowing while painting at certain angles. Worth the money, has been holding up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well and bright!
reviews.reviewText: The neck adjusts amazingly, the brightness settings all work well. I can see myself in different tones of light so it's a great makeup mirror. I just wish the plug in cord was a little longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works very well for a desk lamp.
reviews.reviewText: My major complaint (but to be expected for this type of lamp): you cannot change the bulbs, hence the entire unit will have to be sent to e-waste.My minor complaint (more of a slight irritation than complaint): the on/off dot functions for 2 choices of warm or bright light as well as on or off, which means you have to touch it 3 times to shut it off. If you have already touched it 1 or 2 times for other choices and forget, and then touch it 3 times, you have to do it again.Suggestion for improvement:There should be a touch-on dot for just on/off (it should be bigger and different than the others), another for warmth of light, and keep the current 4 that let you quickly touch a preferred brightness. You might also want to give the dots different textures for when fumbling around in the dark or for those with vision problems.Otherwise I love the size, shape, ease of bending the neck, the fairly large circular lamp head with non-glare hole in the middle, the sturdy base, the overall white looks, and especially the kind of lights it gives off. Very good over a work or reading area, or on low warm is a nice gentle light. I've only had it about 4 months so I cannot yet speak for the longevity. I use it frequently every day on all different settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for detail work
reviews.reviewText: I use it on my desk to do my nails. Great lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and nice quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this lamp for my mother who has macular degeneration. She has tried hand held magnifying glasses, little LED flashlights and nothing works as good as this lamp. She can finally do her puzzles in the morning paper. It’s got such a sturdy base so no worries about it tipping over. Multiple options on the tone of light and the brightness. The light is in a circle so that it event distributes onto whatever you are reading. The gooseneck allows you to pull down close or raise up higher. The center is hollow, it’s not a magnifier but you can peer through the hole and read or do crafts etc with the light evenly surrounding your project. I would recommend it. Great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Zoom and Sewing
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this lamp for 2 weeks and it's great. Remains stable even when the crook is pulled down 90 degrees or even a bit more. I bought this for virtual meetings to light my face in a non-ghoulish manner! but immediately found it very useful for hand-sewing. And, yes, it does work by looking down through the light ring. Light ring diameter is plenty large to light your entire face - no 2nd lamp is needed. I put up a ruler in the picture to show dimensions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The cord is the weakest link
reviews.reviewText: I've had this lamp on the corner of my desk for almost two years. The lamp itself was fine for about a year. Does what I need it to do. However, over time, it's started flickering, and if I even lightly bump the cord it turns off. I have to mess with the connection (it's a pin connector that goes into the base of the lamp) then cycle through the color and brightness again until I get it where I want it. I will not buy again.

Ela tem 24 LEDs brancos e 24 amarelos. Pode-se pôr três tipos de luz: branca, mista e amarela. Pode-se escolher 4 intensidades de iluminação. O plugue dela já é a própria fonte, de tamanho bem pequeno, cuja voltagem de entrada é qualquer uma entre 100 e 240 volts, ou seja, pode ser colocada em qualquer tomada. A voltagem de saída, que vai para a luminária, é 12 volts. O padrão dos pinos de ligar na tomada é o americano, que é aquele onde os dois pinos são chatos, e não vem adaptador para o padrão brasileiro. A haste é flexível, portanto é fácil colocar a luminária na melhor posição, que ilumine bem a escrivaninha e não provoque reflexos e ofuscamento. A base da luminária é circular com 17 cm de diâmetro. A altura dela, se estiver na posição totalmente vertical, é de 58 cm. O aro de iluminação dela também tem 17 cm de diâmetro. O comprimento do fio é de 180 cm.

Like the different levels of brightness as well as light “colour”. The neck is very flexible allowing me to position the light where I need it. The base is small enough to not take up too much space on my small desk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonita y práctica lampara de escritorio!
reviews.reviewText: Fue un regalo para mi mamá y le gustó mucho. La lámpara es muy fácil de utilizar, se ve muy bien y maneja varios niveles de iluminación y colores de luz muy agradable.

The media could not be loaded. Apesar de ser mais cara que as normais, ela entrega um produto de uma qualidade muito boa. A luminosidade dela é muito boa, pode ser utilizada tanto como luminaria de mesa como também ringlight, é linda e maleável, segurando direitinho na posicao que vocês colocarem ela. Podem comprar sem medo, eu certamente não me arrependo ter gastado um pouco mais por um produto muito superior.
Buana iluminación, pero como que tiene un falso y se apaga solo, hay que moverle para que encienda de nuevo
